Uses of Interface
org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature.Histogram

  • Packages that use Histogram 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature
    Package for helper classes over features such as ObjectHistogram or FeatureMeta.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity
    Contains implementation of impurity computers based on histograms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity.basic
    Contains implementation of basic classes for impurity computers.

    • Uses of Histogram in org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature

      Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature with type parameters of type Histogram 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Histogram<T,H extends Histogram<T,H>>
      Interface of histogram over type T.
      Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature that implement Histogram 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ObjectHistogram<T>
      Basic implementation of Histogram that implements also DistributionComputer.

    • Uses of Histogram in org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity

      Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity with type parameters of type Histogram 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ImpurityComputer<T,H extends Histogram<T,H>>
      Interface represents an object that can compute best splitting point using features histograms.
      Subinterfaces of Histogram in org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ImpurityComputer<T,H extends Histogram<T,H>>
      Interface represents an object that can compute best splitting point using features histograms.
      Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity that implement Histogram 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GiniHistogram
      Class contains implementation of splitting point finding algorithm based on Gini metric (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gini_coefficient) and represents a set of histograms in according to this metric.
      class  MSEHistogram
      Class contains implementation of splitting point finding algorithm based on MSE metric (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mean_squared_error) and represents a set of histograms in according to this metric.

    • Uses of Histogram in org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity.basic

      Classes in org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity.basic that implement Histogram 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BootstrappedVectorsHistogram
      Histogram for bootstrapped vectors with predefined bucket mapping logic for feature id == featureId.
      class  CountersHistogram
      Represents a histogram of element counts per bucket.
